comment.author: 54902021@N02
comment._content:
this AC is probably the most infamous, terror rising and hazardous to personnel & property
of the WWII era,  The design of the AC was such that when the AC was place in a dive on target it created a terrible shreking sound that scared people below to panic. It was and is know as the Stuka Dive Bomber and ID as
Ju-87 Stuka  PAFB-DB(1)  Ger  WWII
